resources.string:
Welcome to Wage Motivator! Maybe you are wondering why did someone put time and effort in order to develop a useless app like me. The reason is simple: that someone was getting very bored at work, so he decided to exercise his programming skills developing something more interesting than looking at his empty desk.

Well, here I am.

I was developed as a nice tool to remember you that, no matter what, you are still being paid for your work (hope so). If you didn\'t already go, just go to the Settings and put your daily wage (you know it, don\'t ya) and your working hours, and I will remember you how long it remains to finish your working day, and how much you have earned today, in real time.

What else to say? Enjoy! And remember, please DO NOT touch MY progress bar.
